body:
Confusing example - there's no need to involve math/big. But you're right, tip appears to be wrong. On the playground: http://play.golang.org/p/pnJg1u_z2K:
```
package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
	fmt.Printf("%08x\n", []byte{1})
}
```
we get:
```
00000001
```
On tip we get:
```
01
```
